column4: Hello everyone, I had a little query about my ubuntu system. I wanted to know that how can I send print jobs from a Windows 7 system to a printer connect to USB over a local area network .
Hello everyone, I had a little query about my ubuntu system. I wanted to know that how can I send print jobs from a Windows 7 system to a printer connect to USB over a local area network .
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NetworkPrintingWithUbuntu then add an ipp printer in windows. ipp is the protocol cups uses
So, I wonder how to i add an IPP printer to windows  ?
